text: Sergio Valdés Silva (11 May 1933 – 2 April 2019) was a Chilean footballer. He played as a defender. Valdés was born in Santiago, Chile. He played for played for Club Deportivo Universidad Católica and Deportes Magallanes. He also played for Chile in a third place finish at the 1962 FIFA World Cup. Valdés died of leukaemia on 2 April 2019 in Algarrobo. He was 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:1962 FIFA World Cup players Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Cancer deaths in Chile Category:Footballers from Santiago
title: Sergio Valdés (footballer)
